title: Play button going gray
body: Every time I launch the new League client and after a game, my play button turns gray and I cant click it for a couple of minutes. I already patched to 7.5 so that can't be the reason why it won't let me play. This has been going on ever since 7.5 came out and I cant find a solution to it, please help.

replies.body:
When the play button grays out there are a number of different things that could be causing it. Typically this can be fixed by doubling checking that your pc has all the right permissions to allow League to run properly. 

Check out our [Permission Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) for steps on how you can setup your permissions. Hit me back up if you have any questions.
